testcase.name: testPerformance
testcase.system-out: ----------------------------------------- Testing ANSI pattern matching performance Large text sample before (first 100 chars): &amp#27;[0mText segment 0&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[1mText segment 1&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[2mText segment 2&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[3mText segment 3&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[4mText seg Processing time: 4 ms Large text sample after (first 100 chars): Text segment 0Text segment 1Text segment 2Text segment 3Text segment 4Text segment 5Text segment 6Te
testcase.system-err: [main] INFO io.joshuasalcedo.library.prettyconsole.utils.TextUtilsTest - Starting ANSI pattern test [main] INFO io.joshuasalcedo.library.prettyconsole.utils.TextUtilsTest - Starting performance test [main] INFO io.joshuasalcedo.library.prettyconsole.utils.TextUtilsTest - Completed performance test

testcase.name: testMultipleAnsiCodesInString
testcase.system-out: ----------------------------------------- Testing multiple ANSI codes in a single string Multiple codes text before: &amp#27;[34mBlue&amp#27;[31mRed&amp#27;[0mNormal Multiple codes text after: BlueRedNormal
testcase.system-err: [main] INFO io.joshuasalcedo.library.prettyconsole.utils.TextUtilsTest - Starting ANSI pattern test [main] INFO io.joshuasalcedo.library.prettyconsole.utils.TextUtilsTest - Starting multiple ANSI codes test [main] INFO io.joshuasalcedo.library.prettyconsole.utils.TextUtilsTest - Completed multiple ANSI codes test

testcase.name: testBasicAnsiPatternMatching
testcase.system-out: ----------------------------------------- Testing pattern matching for ANSI escape sequences Red text before: &amp#27;[31mThis is red text&amp#27;[0m Bold text before: &amp#27;[1mThis is bold text&amp#27;[0m Complex formatting before: &amp#27;[1;4;31mBold, underlined, and red&amp#27;[0m No ANSI before: This has no ANSI codes Red text after: This is red text Bold text after: This is bold text Complex formatting after: Bold, underlined, and red No ANSI after: This has no ANSI codes
